newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia Anwar says no reason to undermine ringgit.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia Anwar says no reason to undermine ringgit.

text.p: Malaysian Acting Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said on Thursday the country's stability and its strong economic fundamentals should not provide any reason for the ringgit's strength to be undermined.
The national Bernama news agency quoted him as saying that the central bank would take whatever measures necessary to stave off speculators in the currency market.
"I have full confidence in them (Bank Negara)," he told reporters after an official function, when asked to comment on the central bank's warning to ringgit speculators.
